<Text: Zurracapote:  The concoction is then traditionally left to steep for several days, though some recipes call for the addition of other alcoholic beverages, juices, and fruit extracts.>
Triplets:<Zurracapote

Text: Zurracapote:  The result is a mild-to-medium alcoholic drink, similar to sangría.
